message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a wide range of features that can significantly enhance your daily routine. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Let's start with an offer of $150. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the effort and quality you've put into it. However, based on my research and budget, I am only able to offer $120 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
